original_title: Does God Exist? (Frank Turek vs Christopher Hitchens)
overview: Frank Turek, co-author of "I Don't Have Enough Faith to be an Atheist," and Christopher Hitchens, author of "god is not Great: How Religion Poisons Everything," met at VCU in Richmond, VA to debate the subject, "Does God Exist?"
title: Does God Exist? (Frank Turek vs Christopher Hitchens)
